lines: 1. Tidzamangatu pa thanthwelo, Pa thanthwe losatha Yesu,
Tidzaima nji wosagwanso, Pa nthawi ya namondwe.
Timanga pa thanthwe lolimbalo, Pa Yesu Khristuyo.
2. Alipo amanga pa mchenga, Pa chuma cha dziko lino;
Ndi ena amanga m’tchimolo, Zokoma za pa dziko.
3. Mangani pa thanthwe Khristuyo, Maziko olimbalimba;
